title: Jackie Chan Adventures
description: The J-Team reunites in Season 3 of Jackie Chan Adventures. Jackie faces new challenges in Las Vegas as he is split with a noble tiger and must battle the Dark Chi Enforcers. Valmont is shrunk to the size of a 10 year old while Jade grows 50-feet tall. Jade organizes a petting zoo filled with animals from Section 13 and trouble stirs when the animals are activated. The J-team goes to the Peking...
